data.name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Presenting the official game soundtrack for Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle! Featuring 31 minutes of the most horrific murdalicious game soundtrack music ever!

TRACKLISTING

01. Title Scream (1:44)

02. Run for Your Life - Striker (3:11)
03. Crystal Lake (1:28)
04. Final Girl (1:02)
05. Lockdown (1:30)
06. Final Convict (1:12)
07. Winter Kills (0:32)
08. Manhattan (2:12)
09. Last Resort (1:04)
10. Slayground (1:49)
11. Wasteland (1:14)
12. Future Shock (1:37)
13. Temporal Anomaly (1:14)
14. Final Senior Citizen (1:09)
15. Return to Crystal Lake (0:56)
16. The Ripper (1:31)
17. Knightmare (0:46)
18. Jurassic Jason (1:37)
19. I Can't Stop Killing - The Jasons (1:29)
20. Only the Strong Survive (Theme from Slayaway Camp) - GNÜ TRUNTION (3:40)

FORMAT & ACCESSING

All files provided in 320kbps MP3 and FLAC format. To access the soundtrack files, open the Steam Music Player or right click the game in your library, go to the Local Files tab and "Browse Local Files".

*languages with full audio support
